tool_description: Shazam API helps you to recognize any song from a music file, can fetch data from https://www.shazam.com/, extract information related to artist, track or give top songs by country.
name: Shazam
title: Shazam

api_list.name: Artist Top Tracks
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the top tracks of the artist

api_list.name: Top Track by City
api_list.description: This endpoint will give the top song in specific city

api_list.name: Top Track by Country
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the top tracks from a specific country

api_list.name: Track Recommendations
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the recommendation or similar songs of the given track.

api_list.name: Search Track
api_list.description: This endpoint will search for the name of any song and return similar songs with the name.

api_list.name: Track Info
api_list.description: This endpoint will return info of any track from shazam.com

api_list.name: Artist Search
api_list.description: This endpoint let you search for an artist by their name. You can get a list of artists from its name.

api_list.name: Artist Info
api_list.description: This endpoint will extract information of any artist from https://www.shazam.com.
